K14n445u_001:1082: ahaṃ punaḥ vivikte sthā ātmani acintayaṃ - atigaṃbhīro'
K14n445u_001:1084: ahaṃ ca teṣā deśeyaṃ te ca na ājānīyuḥ,
K14n445u_001:1090: sa ced vadeyaṃ krodhanāyānyasmai satvāya tannūnaṃ,
K14n445u_001:1101: atha brahmā devarājaṃ punaryayāce hṛdayāt prārthayan sakaruṇaṃ yāvat tṛtīyaṃ- "
K14n445u_001:1102: sa ced bhagavān na diśati dharmaṃ,
K14n445u_001:1111: loke satvāḥ samanvāgatāḥ kleśena sthūlena aṇunā,
K14n445u_001:1116: utpalinyaḥ padminyo vā kumudinyaḥ puṃḍarīkiṇyo (vā sarasi)
K14n445u_001:1123: anukaṃpāṃ upādāya te deśayiṣyāmi idānīṃ amṛtadharmadvāraṃ,
K14n445u_001:1133: iti saṃtuṣṭa utthāya pradakṣiṇāṃ kṛtvā buddhasya pādau tribāraṃ śirasā vaṃditvā tatkṣaṇaṃ antaradhāt |
K14n445u_001:1134: aciraprakrānte tasmin atha tathāgataḥ tūṣṇīṃ ātmanyacintayat- '
K14n445u_001:1137: prativasataśca baṃdhumatīnagare kumāro yaśaḥ mahāmātyaputraḥ tiṣyaśca |
K14n445u_001:1139: atha bhagavān yathā balavān puruṣaḥ samaṃjite vimiṃjeta vā (prasāritaṃ)
K14n445u_001:1140: bāhuṃ,tathā tatkṣaṇaṃ mārga vṛkṣe antardhāya yatra baṃdhumatīnagare baṃdhu (mato)
K14n445u_001:1141: rājño mṛgadāvavanaṃ tatra prajñapta āsane nyaṣīdat |
K14n445u_001:1149: mahāmātyaputraṃ tiṣyaṃ ca kaccit na jānāti (bhavān)
K14n445u_001:1154: atha udyānapāla ādeśaṃ gṛhītvā yatra tayordvayoḥ puruṣayoḥ sthānaṃ tatrā'gamat,
K14n445u_001:1161: nupūrvyeṇa dharmaṃ prathamaṃ prakāśayāmāsa sukhena udagrāhayituṃ,
K14n445u_001:1165: apakāraṃ saṃkleśasya ūrdhvāśravabhūmyantarāyasya prajñānaṃ vinirgamaṃ atyaṃtaṃ suṃdaraṃ pariśuddham |
K14n445u_001:1166: yadā bhagavān apaśyat tayorubhayoḥ cittacaittaṃ mṛdu udagraṃ prasannaṃ hṛṣṭaṃ saddharmagrahaṇasamarthaṃ,
K14n445u_001:1170: atha rājaputrasya yaśasaḥ tiṣyasya ca mahāmātyaputrasya tasminnevāsane vītamalaṃ birajaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣurudayādi,
K14n445u_001:1171: tadyathā śuddhaṃ vastraṃ sukhena gṛhṇīyād rajanam |
K14n445u_001:1172: tasmin kāle bhaumā devā tatrāgāyanta idaṃ vacanaṃ - "
K14n445u_001:1173: vipaśyī tathāgataḥ baṃdhumatīnagare mṛgadāvodyāne pravartayāṃcakāra anuttaraṃ dharmacakraṃ,(kenāpi)
K14n445u_001:1174: śramaṇena brāhmaṇena sarvairdevaiḥ mārabrahmaṇā cānyena lokajanena apravartyam |
K14n445u_001:1191: utthāya viśvaśravā nāma ṛṣiduḥkhe jñānaṃ lokato virāgaḥ |
K14n445u_001:1206: sa cet śikṣeta niścinuyāt sarvān dharmān anātmataḥ |
K14n445u_001:1208: necchati yata ājīvalābhaṃ api na yācate yaśaḥ |
K14n445u_001:1217: anuttaraṃ dharmacakramidaṃ buddha eva tadā pravarttayitumalam |
K14n445u_001:1223: tadā rājaputro yaśo mahāmātyaputraḥ tiṣyaścāpaśyatāṃ dharmaṃ,
K14n445u_001:1225: atha tau ūcatuḥ buddhaṃ etad vacanaṃ- "
K14n445u_001:1226: icchāvaḥ tathāgatasya supariśuddhe dharmavinaye brahmacaryaṃ caritum |"
K14n445u_001:1231: tasmin kāle dvau janau alabhatāṃ upasaṃpadam |
K14n445u_001:1232: upasampādya tathāgato nacireṇa prādurakarot nirmāya trīṇi vastūni,
K14n445u_001:1240: mārgaṃ,ādāya cīvaraṃ pariśuddhaṃ pātraṃ ca bhāvayato brahmacaryam |
K14n445u_001:1242: satya eṣa mārgaḥ yata etau cakratuḥ paritatyajatuḥ lokasatkāram |"
K14n445u_001:1243: atha nagarāt caturaśītisahastra manuṣyāḥ jagmuḥ mṛgadāve,
K14n445u_001:1253: prāśaṃsacca naiṣkarmyasya bhāvam atisūkṣmaṃ pariśuddhaṃ anuttaram |
K14n445u_001:1254: yadā bhagavān apaśyat taṃ mahājanaṃ mṛducittaṃ śrāddhaṃ prasannaṃ hṛṣṭatuṣṭaṃ bhavyaṃ saddharmalābhāya |
K14n445u_001:1255: atha taṃ adeśayat dukhaṃ ārya satyaṃ saṃvadamānaḥ saṃvibhajamānaḥ,
K14n445u_001:1263: apaśyat alabhata ca phalaṃ pūrṇaṃ abhayaṃ amṛṣādvāreṇa |
K14n445u_001:1264: atha te'vadan buddhaṃ ca idaṃ vacanaṃ-
K14n445u_001:1265: "icchāmo vayaṃ tathāgatasya supariśuddhe dharmavinaye brahmacaryaṃ caritum | "
K14n445u_001:1271: upasaṃpādya ca tathāgato nacireṇa paryapūrayat bhagavataḥ trivastukāṃ śikṣāṃ,
K14n445u_001:1275: atha te'labhanta anāstravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ avicikitsaprajñāṃ caturāśītisahastraṃ janāḥ |
K14n445u_001:1278: mṛgadāve prāvarttayad anuttaraṃ dharmacakraṃ kenāpi śramaṇenabrāhmaṇena devena māreṇa ca aprāvartyam |"
K14n445u_001:1284: yathā yācante śaraṇāt pradīpāt śīghraṃ kāmayanto nirodhasthānam |
K14n445u_001:1285: eva janā,api śīghraṃ upajammuḥ taṃ tathāgatam ||164 ||
K14n445u_001:1286: api caivaṃ ,tasmin kāle baṃdhumatyāṃ abhavat triśatāṣṭacatvāriṃśatsahastraṃ mahābhikṣusaṃghaḥ |
K14n445u_001:1287: yaśo bhikṣustiṣyo bhikṣuśca tasmin saṃghe udgamya ākāśakāyāt niṣkāsayāmāsatuḥ jalaṃ agniṃ (yamakaprātihāryaṃ)
K14n445u_001:1290: tasmin kāle tathāgataḥ tūṣṇīṃ svacitta uvāca- "
K14n445u_001:1291: asmin nagare ca bhavati triśatāṣṭacatvāriṃśatsahastraṃ mahābhikṣusaṃghaḥ,
K14n445u_001:1292: yannu ahaṃ preṣayeyaṃ dvau dvau pratyekaṃ sthānaṃ ṣaṣṭhe saṃvatsare ca pratyāvarttanaṃ nagare teṣāṃ,
K14n445u_001:1294: ājñāsīt ca tathāgatasya cittaṃ sahāṃpatiḥ brahmā (si-tu-brahma-devo)
K14n445u_001:1295: ,atha yathā balavān puruṣaḥ samiṃjiṃta bāhuṃ prasārayet,
K14n445u_001:1296: tathā tasmād devalokāt niṣkramya upākramat ihātra bhagavataḥ puraḥ śirasā vaṃditvā ekamantaṃ atiṣṭhat |
K14n445u_001:1300: yuktaḥ sarveṣāṃ saṃvibhāgaḥ sarvatra cārikā ca,
K14n445u_001:1302: deśayaṃtu te paripūrṇaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ārakṣiṣyāmi ca tatra chidraṃ na lābhaṃ gaveṣayet |"
K14n445u_001:1303: tadā tathāgato devasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tūṣṇīṃ anvajñāsīt |
K14n445u_001:1304: dṛṣṭvā anujānanaṃ buddhasya sahāṃpatirdevo vaṃditvā buddhasya pādau tat kṣaṇaṃ antardhāya ūrdhvaṃ devalokaṃ pratyāvarttata |
K14n445u_001:1305: na cireṇa tasya gamanāda buddhastān bhikṣūn uvāca-
K14n445u_001:1310: tadā te bhikṣava udgṛhya buddhasya vacanaṃ pātra-cīvaraṃ ādāya vaṃditvā ca buddhaṃ agaman |
K14n445u_001:1312: prāhiṇod buddhaḥ saṃghaṃ vītamohaṃ vītalobhaṃ ca |
K14n445u_001:1313: yathā dṛḍhaḥ suvarṇapakṣaḥ haṃso nipatet riktapuṣkariṇyāḥ ||165 ||
K14n445u_001:1314: atha sahāṃpati deva ekaṃ saṃvatsara vihāya uvāca tān bhikṣūn-
K14n445u_001:1318: yaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ saṃvatsarāṇāṃ atyayena pratyāvartya uddiśata prātimokṣam |"
K14n445u_001:1319: evaṃ yāvat ṣaḍ varṣaṃ devaḥ punaruvāca vacanam |
K14n445u_001:1320: evaṃ yāvat ṣaṣṭhe saṃvatsare devaḥ punaruvāca vacanam-
K14n445u_001:1323: atha te bhikṣavaḥ pratiśrutya devasya vacanaṃ pātracīvaraṃ ādāya pratyāgaman baṃdhumatīnagare,
K14n445u_001:1326: śirasā vaṃditvā buddhasya pādau ekamantaṃ nyaṣīdan |
K14n445u_001:1332: tasmin kāle tathāgato mahataḥ saṃghasya purata ūrdhva vāte paryaṃkaṃ ābhujya nyaṣīdat adiśacca prātimokṣasūtraṃ kṣāṃtiṃ prathamaṃ adiśad buddho nirvāṇaṃ- na bhavati keśa-śmaśravavahāreṇa muṃḍo'
K14n445u_001:1334: tasmin kāle sahāṃpati rdeva upāgamya buddhasya nātidūre gāthābhirabhāṣat stomanavacanaṃ-
K14n445u_001:1346: tasmin kāle bhagavān uvāca tān bhikṣūn -
K14n445u_001:1348: tadā mama citta idaṃ abhūt- yaḥ ko'
K14n445u_001:1349: pi mama upasthānaṃ ṛcchati sahāṃpatidevaṃ parivarjya,
K14n445u_001:1353: tadā mama citta idaṃ abhūt-icchāmi ahaṃ yāvat deveṣu upari gantum |
K14n445u_001:1354: atha ahaṃ yathā valavān puruṣaḥ sammiṃjitaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayet (prasāritaṃ vā samiṃjet,tasmineṣa)
K14n445u_001:1355: kāle ito nirgamya prādurabhūtaṃ teṣu deveṣu |
K14n445u_001:1356: atha te sarve devā māṃ draṣṭuṃ āgatāstatra |
K14n445u_001:1357: (āgamya)ca śirasā vaṃditvā ekamantaṃ sthitā ūcuśca idaṃ vacanaṃvayaṃ sarve śrāvakā vipaśyinam tathāgatasya,
K14n445u_001:1367: ahaṃ etaddeśanārthaṃ āgata iha avadaṃśca te buddhāḥ sahetu-pratyayaṃ sādyantaṃ,
K14n445u_001:1370: puruṣo yathā balavān bāhuṃ samiṃjeta prasārayet |
K14n445u_001:1380: prabhā yathā śaradindoḥ prāptaṃ paramamanuttamaṃ ekam ||175 ||
K14n445u_001:1382: śuddhacittāḥ tata āgatya na kleśaṃ prāpnuvaṃti te ||176 ||
K14n445u_001:1388: cittaṃ saṃśodhya gato nirgamya bhava svāminaḥ ||179 ||
K14n445u_001:1409: buddho'vocadidaṃ mahāvadānasūtraṃ atha te bhikṣavaḥ śrutvā buddhasya bhāṣitaṃ āttamanasaḥ samanvamodantta ||
